author: Nagesh Jinde
text:
Ok so acc to the "Pandits of Cricket", if a team wins a match from a dead-end, it is a fixed match.
If a player misses a catch, he is fixing, 
If a batsman misses to hit , he is fixing and ofc!
If a bowler bowls a no-ball, he is fixing!
#fixerkings #IPL #csk

author: Nagesh Jinde
Nagesh Jinde
text:
**STAT ALERT**
Every time India loses a test match, they bounce back in the next game.
Centurion 2017- LOST ---> Johannesburg 2017- WON
Lords 2018- LOST ---> Nottingham 2018- WON
Adelaide 2020- LOST ----> Melbourne 2020- WON
Chennai 2021- LOST ----> Chennai 2021- WON
#ENGvsIND

author: Nagesh Jinde
Nagesh Jinde
text:
Cricket is still a gentlemen's game but the audience it has is not!
Day 1- Indian batting order collapsed and everyone trolled Virat and the company
Day 3- Admanant fight by the Indian top order against the new cherry and everyone suddenly comes in awe of Virat and mgt!
#ENGvIND

author: Nagesh Jinde
text:
Close your eyes. Join your hands. And pray for a sunny day at the Leed's! 
#ENGvIND @cricketaakash @DineshKarthik @bhogleharsha @WasimJaffer14

author: Nagesh Jinde
Nagesh Jinde
text:
And suddenly, our batting coach who was being hailed for the wonderful performance of our boys in Lord's is now being trolled.
We still have 4 days of Test cricket left and you never know what is going to happen!
#INDvENG

author: Nagesh Jinde
text:
THE GREAT INDIAN COLLAPSE!
56/4 to 78 ALL-OUT!
#INDvENG 
These are the times when we expect our senior-most players to come out and show what they have got, but India yet again fails! Credit goes to the bowling attack of England!

author: Nagesh Jinde
text:
Yes, it was an epic and historic win at the Lord's.
But England is not a side that is going to get side-lined after one loss! Their ego has been hurt and they will try to bounce back! 
If we continue the same momentum, then we can win this series! Great game!
#IndvsEng #ENGvsIND

author: Nagesh Jinde
text:
And India win the match!
Joe Root out!
#IndvsEng #ENGvIND

author: Nagesh Jinde
text:
One major threat for India- JOE ROOT!
Once he's gone, England won't even survive for 20 overs!
#INDvENG #Lords @MichaelVaughan @bhogleharsha @StuartBroad8 
Agree?

author: Nagesh Jinde
text:
Now, this is getting a bit tricky!
Totally agree that India can add a bit more runs and add the pressure on England! 
But can they crumble out the English side within 45-50 overs?
With rain being a major factor!
#IndvsEng #LordsTest

author: Nagesh Jinde
text:
C:   Cancel 
B:   Board’s 
S:   Sabhi 
E:   Exams

Don't let the exam centres become COVID hotspots.
Students are precious. 
#CancelExamsSaveLives 
#cancelclass12thboardexams2021

author: Nagesh Jinde
text:
Mr. Education Minister, please listen to students!
We all are pleading you to cancel exams, not because we are scared of exams but because we are afraid that we might get ourselves and our peers infected by the deadly virus!
#CancelExamsSaveLives 
#cancelclass12thboardexams2021

author: Nagesh Jinde
text:
In a recent post of Education Minister, he is spreading awareness about staying at home, and meanwhile, he is also telling crores of class 12 students to come out and write exams!
Nice Minister! God Save Us!
#cancelExamsSaveStudent 
#cancelcbse12thboardexams2021 
@DrRPNishank

author: Nagesh Jinde
text:
Yes, we agree that Covid cases have decreased, but have they become "ZERO"? No, and the Govt wants us to write our Board exams in a situation where there is a lot of mental stress! Conducting exams in such a situation would be a massacre!
#cancelExamsSaveStudent

author: Nagesh Jinde
text:
All the best for your hearing in the court maam! 
You're a guardian angel in our lives!
May you bring us glory!
@AdvMamtaSharma 
#modijisave12thstudents

author: Nagesh Jinde
text: Batch of 2019-20 had the advantage of offline classes, they had been to offline classes the whole year and the Batch of 2020-21 has not attended a single offline class and we all know the diff between offline and online classes! And the Govt still wants to conduct offline exams!

text:
2nd wave of Covid - Bengal Elections and Kumb mela

WAKE UP MODI GOVT! 
#cancelExamsSaveStudent

author: Nagesh Jinde
text:
Mr. PM, even we 12th class students are human beings and we are also suffering from mental fatigue! Pl try to understand and cancel our board exams! Its a request sir! 
This wave is too dangerous as you can see even you dont have ans for it!
#DONTIGNORE12THSTUDENTS #boards2021

author: Nagesh Jinde
text:
Well, Mr. PrimeMinister does "MANN KI BAAT" every Sunday, then why is he not able to understand the mental situation of lakhs of students.
Mr. PrimeMinister it is high time now! Don't waste our time!
It's a request sir! @narendramodi @DrRPNishank  #cancel12thboardexams2021

author: Nagesh Jinde
text:
Mr. Chief Minister when will you stop manipulation in the no. of per-day cases?
Ashamed of showing the black truth to the public who voted you?
#KTR @KTRTRS @TSwithKCR @trspartyonline #cancel12thboardexams2021 #ModiResignOrRepeal

author: Nagesh Jinde
text:
Well, I guess Mr.Chai Wala is waiting for 500k cases per day in our country.
Whatsoever, the youth of India is being affected by this disastrous disease
One request to Mr.Ache din,
No youth No BJP in power and I think then we will actually have ache din  #cancel12thboardexams2021

author: Nagesh Jinde
text:
Wake up Mr. Prime minister and see how the situation is! It js is complete nightmare for students to study in this environment which has a lot of negativity going around!It's all because of u! Cancel the boards!
#cancel12thboardexams2021

author: Nagesh Jinde
text:
300k+ cases every day and the GOVT OF INDIA has no idea what a student is going through!
Postponement of exams adds to tension and COVID-19 is making it worse!
Idk y cant the govt not understand what is going on in a 17-year child's mind. Save us, god! #cancel12thboardexams2021

author: Nagesh Jinde
text:
Mr. PrimeMinister stop focusing on votes because you can win votes only if people are alive to vote!
So please start focusing on how to manage Covid and make vaccines available for people under 45 years of age!
#ModiMadeDisaster #ModiGovtSeNaHoPayega #ModiStopElectionRallies

author: Nagesh Jinde
text:
200k+ covid cases in India and Mr. PrimeMinister is busy doing rallies and asking for votes!
Little does he understand about the mental condition of students! 
POSTPONING EXAMS ARE JUST GOING TO ADD UP THE PRESSURE!
#CancelAllBoardExams #internalassessment #cbseboardexam2021

author: Nagesh Jinde
text:
Great decision by the Govt to postpone class 12 exams but it is going to have a long term impact, class 12 students have lot more things to do! Competitive exams and Colleges! 
Postponing exams is not the solution!
Indian govt plz look into it!
 #cancelboardexam2021

author: Nagesh Jinde
text:
CANCEL EXAMS! THERE IS A LOT OF STRESS AMONG STUDENTS! EVEN WE ARE HUMAN BEINGS AND MENTAL STRESS AT SUCH YOUNG AGE IS VERY BAD FOR THE YOUTH AS WELL AS THE NATION!
CBSE ! WAKE UP

https://t.co/r3HWO1bYXp
#cancelboardexams2021 #CBSE #cbseboardexam2021 @narendramodi @DrRPNishank

author: Nagesh Jinde
text:
*ALARM*180k cases have been reported in the country today and this is the highest tally ever!
And don't know y is CBSE and the HRD Ministry being so lenient about it! What r are they waiting for? Seeing 1000's students in hospitals? Disaster!  #CBSE #cancelcbseboards2021

author: Nagesh Jinde
text:
#dhokebaazmodi  guys make this trending and let the govt know that when we unit, we can shake the whole world!
#cancelboardexam2021 #cbseboardexam2021 #CBSE 
Cancel karo cancel karo, humare exams cancel karo!
Jaisi shiksha waisi parikhsha! @narendramodi @DrRPNishank @cbseindia29

author: Nagesh Jinde
text:
#cancelboardexam2021 #CBSE #internalassessment @DrRPNishank @narendramodi @cbseindia29 
How ignorant is our govt? 170k cases and still they are so lenient, not at all expected from the MODI GOVT @BJP4India https://t.co/cRp9QAZvje

author: Nagesh Jinde
text:
Modi saab! 200k cases ka wait karre ho kya?
Remember one thing! You are jeopardizing the health of students! We will remember this and dekhte hai 2023 mai kiski sarkar banti hai!
@narendramodi @PMOIndia @DrRPNishank @cbseindia29 
#cancelboardexam2021 #internalassessment

author: Nagesh Jinde
text:
Sonu Sood Sir is here to help us! Once again!
We love you, sir!
You might play the role of villains in movies but you are the true hero of our country!
#cancelboardexam2021 #JusticeForStudents #internalassessment @DrRPNishank @narendramodi @PMOIndia @POTUS @cbseindia29 https://t.co/4xuxBtD9HO

author: Nagesh Jinde
Nagesh Jinde
text:
How can the CBSE be so careless about students and risk our life! Agreed postponement of exams is not a solution here but exams can either be held online or can be cancelled!
What is CBSE waiting for? Seeing 100's and 1000's of students being tested positive?
#internalassessment

author: Nagesh Jinde
text:
Everyone in that news panel was talking about following Covid protocols but no one ever mentioned the mental fatigue, no one spoke about how effective are the online classes and can, the students risk their fate and give offline exams? @sanket 
#cancelboardexams2021

text:
COUPLE OF TEACHERS HAVE TESTED POSITIVE IN OUR SCHOOL(BHAVANS SRI RAMAKRISHNA VIDYALAYA,SAINIKPURI) AND THE MGT WANTS THE STUDENTS TO COME TO SCHOOL AND WRITE EXAMS.

author: Nagesh Jinde
text:
We didnt receive the answers of the questions we had asked.
The majority of students and parents want CBSE 2020-2021 BOARDS to be postponed.
But there's no response regarding this topic.
When will the board  postpone exams, after n number of students being tested positive? https://t.co/AtphUGSuVx

author: Nagesh Jinde
text:
The Sensex has touched 46,000 points for the first time!
Party time? No!
With almost all the businesses being shut in India for almost like 9 months, how is the stock market seeing this real progress?
Something like this happened in the year 1992.
@RBI @PMOIndia @DasShaktikanta

author: Nagesh Jinde
text:
I would request the Education Minister of India to postpone the CBSE 2020-2021 boards by 45-60 days.
Giving 'n' number of holidays between exams wont work and that is just going to build up pressure among students
#EducationMinisterGoesLive @DrRPNishank 
https://t.co/OHOwh6KSrc

text: That wont work mate! This is a "BOARD" exam and these marks will be recorded and will be useful for our future. So by keeping our BOARDS online is not at all useful! https://t.co/7JrBSZU54Q
